title: What is the value of education in the 21st century? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's an education that sets children up to succeed in a world where more than half of the jobs they'll have over their careers don't even exist yet. In short, it's an education that provides students with the skills and competencies they need to thrive in the 21st century https://jvz1.com/c/1696521/275301
